title: Torus - It's a donut
disconnected-dropped: Connection dropped (are you still connected to the internet?)
error-login: You don't appear to be logged in. You must have an account to use chat on Wikia. Please [[Special:UserSignup|register]] or [[Special:UserLogin|log in]].
error-otherbrowser: You are connected to $1 from another window.
error-longmessage: You can't send messages that long - try shortening it, or send it as two messages.
options-help-maxmessages: Maximum number of messages that can be displayed at one time. A higher number will give you more scrollback, but may slow down the tab.
options-help-showrejoins: Rejoins are when a user who is already in the room joins again without leaving first. They're usually caused by minor server glitches and generally aren't useful.
options-help-timezone: Timezone to print timestamps in (as UTC + this number).
options-help-maxemotes: Maximum number of emotes to display per message. A higher number will let your friends spam more smilies, but may slow down the tab.
options-help-defaultrooms: Rooms to open when Torus starts.
options-help-joinlocal: Whether or not to join the local chat room.
options-help-colorsat: Saturation shift. 0 is colorless, 1 is as much color as possible.
options-help-colorval: Value (luminosity) shift. 0 is black, 1 is as bright as possible.
options-help-joinchatlinks: Instead of following chat links, open them in the current Torus window.
